description.displayText:
Dani has been watching my two sons, ages 2 and 4, for 2 years now, since my youngest was 8 months old. She is so caring, loving, energetic, positive, and kind. She loves being busy with them and is always on-the-go. She takes them places like the zoo, library story time, gymnastics, playgrounds. I trust her driving my kids around. She is very dependable - always shows up on time. 

My kids love her, and I have loved Dani being a part of my family for the past 2 years. Any family would be lucky to have her help!
description.originalText:
Dani has been watching my two sons, ages 2 and 4, for 2 years now, since my youngest was 8 months old. She is so caring, loving, energetic, positive, and kind. She loves being busy with them and is always on-the-go. She takes them places like the zoo, library story time, gymnastics, playgrounds. I trust her driving my kids around. She is very dependable - always shows up on time. 

My kids love her, and I have loved Dani being a part of my family for the past 2 years. Any family would be lucky to have her help!

description.displayText: Where do I begin? Dani is great! She cared for my babies like they were her own. From infancy until it was time for them to go to school I never had to question the safety and well being of my hearts. She was always on time and sometimes I could count on her when I needed her on her off day. They listened to her at times when they wanted to give me a hard time. She taught them, took them places and was always respectful. I was sad when my kids grew up and had to move on. Dani is the best and if I ever have more kids, I hope that she will be available as it is very hard to trust people nowadays. They just don't make them like her anymore!

description.displayText: Dani has been with our family since our twins were infants - over 2 1/2 years.  She is dependable and trustworthy and our children absolutely adore her.  Dani is full of energy and willing to teach children through fun, engaging activities.  Dani is a wonderful addition to our family.
